# NWProtocolFramer.Instance.WakeupTime.milliseconds(_:)

**Case**

A specific number of milliseconds from now.

## Declaration

```swift
case milliseconds(UInt64)
```

## Time Values

- **NWProtocolFramer.Instance.WakeupTime.forever**: A sentinel value to indicate that no wakeup should be delivered.
